summary: Young Katy claims a wild horse as her own -- an effort to prove to her father that she is capable of taking over the family horse ranch one day.
cast: Tim McGraw|Maria Bello|Alison Lohman|Ryan Kwanten|Danny Pino|Dallas Roberts|Kaylee DeFer|Jeffrey Nordling|Dey Young|Nick Searcy|Buck Taylor|Wade Williams|David Burton|John O'Brien|Armie Hammer|Elizabeth Emery|Bob Tallman|Angel Santana|Emma Ritchie|Gene McLaughlin|John Eric Brown|Michael Dane|Jemma Evans|Rana Morrison|Bogdan Szumilas|Sebastien Szumilas|Rachel Zeskind
title: Flicka
